q: 41-year-old, currently Controller of BBC Global News, replaces Andy Coulson , who resigned earlier this month amid the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the News of the World. Mr David Cameron said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. "Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme. Mr Oliver said: "I'm delighted to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time. "It's difficult to leave the BBC after a fascinating few years
